transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello Mohammed Manji se
Executive: Haan ji aawaz aa rahi hai
Customer: Haan ji sir meri good afternoon main India Mart se baat kar rahi hoon
Customer: Ji
Executive: Ji ye aapne sir kafi bari concern yahan pe raise kiya hua hai even aapki team se baat bhi isme ho chuki hai to team ne aapko just kiya hai ki aapko thoda time aapko wait karna hoga
Customer: Kitna wait karu main
Executive: One month
Customer: Ji
Executive: Sir one month kyuki abhi aath no din pehle hi aapki mapping wagera yahan pe change ki gayi hai
Customer: Maine do mahine se main wait kar raha hoon main
Executive: Haan to ye jo pehla concern aapne raise kiya tha wo first of November ko kiya tha dusra concern jo aapne yahan pe raise kiya wo aapne 10th of November ko kiya to 10 November ko yahan pe aapke catalog pe kaam kiya gaya abhi yahan pe teesra concern jo aapne apna raise kiya wo 18 November ko kiya
Customer: Nahi usse pehle bhi maine baat ki thi unse kya wo manager the wo jinse baat ki thi maine
Executive: Parth Raijada ji jo the unse hai na
Customer: Hello
Executive: Aapke matlab aapke pehle discussion hua tha yahan pe Parth Raijada ji se
Customer: Samajh mein nahi aa raha aawaz nahi aa rahi
Executive: Parth ji se aapki pehle baat hui thi sir aap usse pehle Parth ji se
Customer: Hello aawaz nahi aa rahi mam aapki
Executive: Aawaz aa rahi hai ki meri abhi aapko
Customer: Samajh mein nahi aa rahi kya bol rahe ho aawaz saaf nahi aa rahi
Executive: Abhi saaf aa rahi hai
Customer: Ji boliye
Executive: Ji Parth ji se aapki baat hui thi pehle
Customer: Parth
Executive: Parth Parth se baat hui thi aapki sir pehle
Customer: Nahi nahi samajh mein nahi aa raha main kya bol raha
Executive: Ek second abhi aa rahi meri aawaz
Customer: Samajh mein nahi aa raha kya bol rahe cut cut ke aawaz aa rahi hai
Executive: Ji aa rahi hai sir aawaz
Customer: Haan ji boliye
Executive: Parth ji se aapki pehle baat hui thi
Customer: Kisse
Executive: Abhi nahi aa rahi hai sir Parth Parth Parth
Customer: Parth
Executive: Parth se baat hui thi na aapki sabse
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji
Customer: Hello
Executive: Sir main keh rahi thi Parth se baat hui thi na aapki pehle
Customer: Parth ko samajh mein nahi aa raha kisse baat hui thi mere ko
Executive: Aapki Parth se baat hui thi sir pehle Parth P A R T H
Customer: Parth
Executive: Ji ji ji sir Parth
Customer: Ji
Customer: Kab baat hui thi
Executive: October mein
Customer: Ji
Executive: Abhi aa rahi hai aawaz
Customer: Haan ji usse pehle bhi maine baat ki thi maine ek dedh mahina package lene liya tha na us time dedh mahine baad baat ki thi maine
Executive: To unhone bola hai main aapko wahi samjha rahi hoon ki abhi abhi humne aapke catalog mein kuch changes kiye hai kal se aap meri baat suno aap changes karte raho mere ko matlab nahi hai se
Customer: Bas ab jab bhi call karta na tabhi kehte na aapka catalog change ho raha hai wo kar raha hoon wo kar raha hoon falana ho ja raha hai aisa ho raha hai waisa ho raha hai
Executive: To lekin jo cheez aap bol rahe ho wo bhi to aap hi to soch ke dekho na sir refund ki policy hoti hi nahi hai aapko
Customer: Refund nahi nahi kisne bola hai mere ko
Executive: Sir humne ye cheez bola hai to maine is time bhi baat ki thi maine to ab bola ki abhi to aapka ek do mahina ek mahina hua hai
Executive: Sir refund ki policy aapki tab hoti na jab aapko buyleads na mil rahi hoti
Customer: To lead maine use kahan mili hai ek bhi to nahi hua mera
Executive: Sir lekin buyleads aapke catalog par ja rahi hai lekin
Customer: Sab sab farzi hai wo sab farzi hai
Executive: Sir abhi aapke nahi wo aapne kaha ki mere ko do din se buyleads nahi mil rahi hai abhi aap bol rahe ho sab farzi hai
Customer: Haan wo pehle mil rahi thi na abhi to kahan mil rahi hai abhi to kuch bhi nahi aaya mere paas mein lead wagera abhi to do din se hi problem aa raha hai sir thoda to patience rakhiye na
Customer: Maine kitna rakhna hai mere ko to nahi rakhna hai mere ko to char char panch mahine nahi ho gaye business ke liye to paise faltu ke thodi aate ho
Executive: Lekin aise sir aapko refund ka sir mere ko to nahi nahi refund to hota hai kya nahi nahi refund ko to hota hai
Customer: Hello
Executive: Nahi nahi refund to hota hai refund ka refund tab hota hai jab aapke sir refund tab hota hai jab
Customer: Hello
Executive: Buyleads na aa rahi ho lekin jo cheez aap
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji
Executive: Sir aawaz aa rahi hai
Customer: Cut cut ke aawaz aa rahi hai
Executive: Ruko main dusre number se call kar rahi hoon
Customer: Achcha number se call kar diya aapne
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received buyleads.

- Wants refund for the subscription.

- States catalog changes are frequent.

Resolution:

- Executive explained the refund policy.

- Executive stated changes were made to catalog.

- Executive asked customer to wait.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will call from another number.

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, catalog, subscription
